website_summaries.verdict: The Under Armour Charged Bandit Trail is an ideal pair for runners who are looking for a good blend of flexibility and cushioning. Packed with technical features meant to deliver a highly durable and shock-absorbing running experience, the Charged Bandit Trail will truly allow you to conquer the trails.
pros: A lot of the wearers admire the lightweight construction of the Under Armour Charged Bandit Trail
The shoe is highly durable, according to many
Several commend the shoe because it does not require a long break-in period
It is super grippy, remarked a few users
Some runners say that the shoe is very comfortable
cons: One purchaser expressed that the shoe felt too tight
A particular customer has a concern regarding the durability of the shoe’s toe cap

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes
customer_reviews.text: I like to walk in the woods wearing nothing but my shoes. Sometimes I come across some hikers. Can you imagine the look on their faces......when they see these awesome shoes?
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Runs very small
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 14 in tennis shoes and these run super small. My big toe was rubbing the tip of the shoe. Had to return them. Order the size 15 and waiting for those.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart already. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Unable to get a response or request refund/return. Unacceptable! At first, I loved these shoes. Third type of UA shoes I’ve bought over the past few years. They are very comfortable... BUT unfortunately after only wearing them 4 times, the bottom is already starting to come undone. I’ve worn these on a few walks, that’s it. For them to be falling apart already is ridiculous. The system will not let me contact the seller because it has been over a month, which now means I wasted money and Amazon won’t do anything about it. I didn’t pay for shoes to fall apart after wearing them 4 times. Very upset.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Dumschat

customer_reviews.title: AAA+++
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd pair, extremely comfortable and great quality. Highly recommended, great for trails or every day use. Bought the 1st pair and hiked Havasupai without breaking them in with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good.
customer_reviews.text: I thoroughly like these shoes, but have one issue with the heel fit being to loose. I was able to remedy this with a different kind of lacing pattern. It also works great with the prosthetic.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua M Holm

customer_reviews.title: I love them.
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money!! I’ve tried to find a trail shoe that I can wear all the time for a while now. After several returns these were it!
customer_reviews.author: Trinity Snarr

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing shoes... but I think size is a little bit smaller or fit exactly... I would prefer to add 0.5 to my original size. Already tried it on trail and was great.
customer_reviews.author: Mohamed E.

customer_reviews.title: Buy 'em. They're great.
customer_reviews.text: I had to order a half size up but other than that they are great sneakers. Fit well and are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoe - bit narrow.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe with amazing tread. The fit is a bit on the narrow side with not much give due to material. Length is as expected.
customer_reviews.author: ACMC

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, stylish athletic shoe with nice tread
customer_reviews.text: Shoe looks and fits great, seems perfect for the trail, running, and working out. I won't know about durability yet because they're brand new-- but I'm sure they're about as durable as most sneakers (lol so not terrific I'm assuming).
customer_reviews.author: David H

customer_reviews.title: Little bit tight on the toes
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are great, very comfortable, even though they are a little tight on the toes
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Trujillo

customer_reviews.title: For size15 run small
customer_reviews.text: Size 15. Small and the side support is poor! I have had stability problems with them on hikes.
customer_reviews.author: Karl R. Scheib

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for daily use.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Good foot and arch support. Traction is great and they don't make my feet sweat. I have every color now and still love them.
customer_reviews.author: JOE LEDET

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! Breaks In fast and are super comfortable and provides great support and traction
customer_reviews.author: Johnnyboyfoster

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight strong shoes
customer_reviews.text: Best shoes I’ve ever had. I bought them for a spartan race but i have been using them for everything.
customer_reviews.author: Javier Paramedic

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow
customer_reviews.text: I received these on July 9th and within 2 weeks I started getting an ingrown toenail because they are too narrow. I normally wear a size 10, I ordered a 10.5 because they didn’t offer a wide fit shoe. I’m now looking for a replacement shoe with a wide fit.
customer_reviews.author: Bill G.

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Looked good and fit to size. They are also a little more supportive for trails. Happy with my purchase. 3rd pair in a row UA has done right.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and Sporty!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable recreational tennis shoe. Was on my feet for 10 hours walking around Disneyland in them with little to no fatigue!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Viloria

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I like the UA brand. These had a very cheap feel to them. Plastic type material.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Cortez

customer_reviews.title: Good trail shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes. I bought two pair so I can have an extra pair to run the trails. They are comfortable and light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Do itt
customer_reviews.text: Worth it bro ☺️😌😊 doooo it better than the new one
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Falcon

customer_reviews.title: So far so good...
customer_reviews.text: Shoe feels good so far, a little small but it's okay. Lets see how they hold up after months.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Sizes
customer_reviews.text: Tight shoe need to go a half bigger But good for work
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I hike a lot and was looking for something light weight and durable since I live In Arizona. These are absolutely perfect! They fit great and only took a mile to break in. Im definitely going to buy another pair
customer_reviews.author: anthony

customer_reviews.title: Perfect trail shoe for you
customer_reviews.text: The perfect trail shoe that does well in any environment.
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: Need a great running shoe for the trail?
customer_reviews.text: The Good: -Great traction for the trail -Good fit -Nice firm cushion in mid sole -Stylish -Breathable -Comfortable toe box The Bad: -Definitely size up 1 full size The Bottom Line: I really like these Under Armour bandit trail running shoes. They are comfortable if you get the right size. You should definitely go up a full size from your dress shoe. The cushion is firm but is comfortable. The traction on these shoes are great and provide for a lot of grip on the trail or loose stuff. Overall, I would recommend these running shoes if you like trail running. **Disclosure: I received a sample product from the Amazon Vine program for an honest and unbiased review.
customer_reviews.author: Hoppaguy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish but sizes run small
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of Under Armor shoes and each one has been a great shoe. These are comfortable, even though I need a special arch support, and they look good. Plus, they have a sole that provides good grip. Before I removed the shoe cushion I found it to be comfortable and well made. Now that I've had several pair I know that I need to size up a little because they run small. I normally wear a 9 or 9 and a half but these 10s are a perfect fit for me.
customer_reviews.author: TWL50

customer_reviews.title: Great hiking shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shoe for hiking in Moab. They were comfortable, protected my toes, and grippy enough for scrambling. Used them the next day for mountain biking, and they did well gripping the pedals. I am a female with wide feet and purchased size 9 in men's usually I am 10-101/2 W. Very happy they feel well made, supportive. First pair of UA.
customer_reviews.author: Ethel

customer_reviews.title: Great for everyday, walking or running
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these shoes for my son. He likes running for exercise and training for basketball. None of his basketball shoes are good for running or even walking long distances. These shoes are perfect for walking and running. They are even great for everyday wearing. They fit well and are true to size. There was nothing to dislike. These shoes have great support and cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly S.

customer_reviews.title: COOL
customer_reviews.text: My son is VERY particular about shoes, probably due to his slightly wide width. He really likes these as they fit his feet well because they are a little stretchy on the sides. He also thinks they look pretty cool, which is obviously important to a 13 year old!
customer_reviews.author: K.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight And Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are well made, lightweight, and comfortable. The thick cushioned outsole make it less likely for dirt to get onto the mesh top of the shoes, and the speckled sides make dirt less visible. Durability remains to be seen, but as of now, I love them. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Stack⠀Overflow

customer_reviews.title: Comfy , lets some rain in
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on and comfortable wearing all day. It does seem like it lets some water in when its raining
customer_reviews.author: Nick A.

product_meta.title: Under Armour - Mens Charged Bandit Trail Shoes
